entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-02-11
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Annotating a type with a JSON converter blocks the JSON source generator crawling #82001
  • corehost build doesn't seem to be properly incremental #82000
  • SocketsHttpHandler persistent request timeouts due to .NET 6 connection pooling behavior #81989
  • Refactor EventSource/EventProvider command scheme so it is more understandable #81987

Closed

  • Volatile.Read/Write aren't atomic for Int64 on 32bit #81999
  • SemaphoreSlim Wait/WaitAsync heavy lag #53598
    Future
  • Crossgen2 asserts in JIT when compiling The JIT\Regression\JitBlue\Runtime_81739 #81963
    8.0.0
  • ConfigurationBinder doesn't honor pre-existing ISet when binding #79766
    7.0.x
  • XmlSqlBinaryReader is not working in .Net6 #74852
    8.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • [wasi] Fix the setting of XUNIT_RANDOM_ORDER_SEED, wasmtime uses --en… #82003
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Generalize `emitRemoveLastInstruction()` #82002
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • JIT: Handle some "field offset computation" patterns #81998
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Convert to GeneratedRegexAttribute fixer should preserve references to const string fields #81997
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions, community-contribution
  • #78303 Draft: Add transformation ~v1 & v2 to VectorXxx.AndNot(v1, v2) #81993
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • remove test references to archaic Linux versions #81992
    area-Meta, test-enhancement
  • Move a number of JsonPropertyInfo reflection components to DefaultJsonTypeInfoResolver #81990
    area-System.Text.Json, 8.0.0
  • Add emsdk dependencies to fix codeflow to installer #81988
    area-Infrastructure-installer

Merged

  • Add basic support for folding SIMD intrinsics #81547
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Use IndexOfAnyValues in another place in System.Text.Json #81976
    area-System.Text.Json
  • [release/6.0] Fix NullabilityInfoContext.Create throws IndexOutOfRangeException and other bugs #81291
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Reflection, 6.0.15
  • [release/7.0] Unpin the C# compiler version #81247
    area-Infrastructure, 7.0.4
  • [release/7.0] Fix filtered exceptions when checking for ip forwarding #81157
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Net, 7.0.4
  • [6.0] Fix internal coreclr debian helix queue not found #81978
    area-Infrastructure
  • Disable RTTI on Unix #81986
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Handle renamed compressed .mibc files gracefully in crossgen2/dotnet-pgo #81955
    area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • Transform IntCon(0) to VecCon(0) for WithElement case - fixes emitter assertion for crossgen2 #81981
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Add additional case where public signing cannot be used #77998
    area-Meta, community-contribution
  • JIT: in minimal profiling mode, ignore impact of conditional throws #81972
    area-CodeGen-coreclr

Updated

  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 679: Build ID 2111486 #81871
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Don't instrument methods with [Intrinsic] #81983
    area-VM-coreclr
  • [tests] Stand up iOS arm runtime tests and enable tracing/eventpipe tests #79169
    area-Infrastructure-mono, runtime-mono
  • Enable building NativeAOT for Apple mobile platforms #81780
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Adding support to mono for v128 constants #81902
  • [mono] RuntimeHelpers.CreateSpan<T> is now intrinsic. #81695
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • Avoid a few unnecessary char.ToStrings #81980
    area-System.IO
  • Replace some single-char strings with chars #81831
    area-Meta
  • [release/6.0] Fix thread-safety issues with enumerating ResourceManager. #81281
    NO-MERGE, Servicing-approved, area-System.Resources, 6.0.15
  • [release/7.0] Fix thread-safety issues with enumerating ResourceManager. #81283
    NO-MERGE, Servicing-approved, area-System.Resources, 7.0.x
  • Add CollectionsMarshal.SetCount(list, count) #77794
    area-System.Collections, new-api-needs-documentation, 8.0.0
  • String.Split() trim last substring if specified #81331
    area-System.Runtime, community-contribution
  • Implement DivRem intrinsic for X86 #66551
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, new-api-needs-documentation, 8.0.0
  • Create BitArray.HasAllSet() and .HasAnySet(). #81527
    area-System.Collections, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Issue correct Enable/Disable commands for EventSources with EventPipe #81867
    area-Tracing-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • Fix XmlSqlBinaryReader and introduce a corpus of SqlXml tests #81878
    area-System.Xml, 8.0.0
  • [mono][jit] Parametrized macros for emitting arm64/neon opcodes #81887
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • Unify type instantiations in reflection emit #81518
    area-System.Reflection
  • [android][ios] Add LibraryBuilder task to support aot library mode #81919
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Implementation of Lemire's nearly divisionless method #79790
    area-System.Runtime, community-contribution
  • Testmerging JIT/Directed #81969
    area-System.Reflection.Metadata
  • [JIT] X64 - Extend emitter peephole optimization of eliminating unnecessary `mov` instructions #79381
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Allow some intrinsics in Tier0 (e.g. Enum.HasFlag) #77357
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Initial support for zmm in .NET #80960
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-avx512
  • Allow root path for Microsoft.VisualBasic.FileIO.SpecialDirectories #81861
    area-Microsoft.VisualBasic
  • JIT: start working on profile consistency #81936
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
